name: 𝗕𝗘𝗟𝗧𝗔𝗛-𝗠𝗗 𝗕𝗢𝗧
description: THIS IS OLD VERSION OF BELTAH-MD  MAKE SURE YOU UPDATE YOUR BOT ONCE CONNECTED🤖✅👻

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

GREET.description: when enabled it automatically sends  greeting message to members in your pm

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be liked automatically (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUTOBIO.description: This automatically update your bio status.Always make sure you insert your OWNER_NAME since it uses that to update your bio name status

CHATBOT.description: When activated, It will chat with everyone on your dm

TALKING_BOT.description: Bot will listen to voice notes and responds to them

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Restrict other users from using your bot in private messages (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Type your anticall message to always send when calls are declined.You can as well leave it blank

BOT_NAME.description: Change this if you don't like my name

GROUP_CONTROL.description: urs if you want bot yo control group features such as antilink,antispam,antibad

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set 'yes' to make your bot public or 'no' to keep it private

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your session ID, the code you receive after scanning the QR code

OWNER_NAME.description: don't you have a name bro.Insert your name here!!

URL.description: Change this image and input yours

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your phone number (exclude '+' and area code, e.g., '254114141192')

WARN_COUNT.description: Set the warning limit for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Set 'yes' to display a starting bot message or 'no' to disable it

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 for online, 2 for typing, 3 for recording, or leave blank for real state

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Enable anti-delete message (set 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate)

ANTICALL.description: Automatically decline incoming calls (set 'on' to activate or 'off' to deactivate)

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically  block those who insult you in your dm

AUTO_REACTION.description: Set 'yes' to enable bot reactions to messages in private chats
